name: SLAP!
description:
Join your friends in this 4-player, split-screen, couch co-op game. Collect coins and slap each other to gain points, but beware the Slaphead! As they will attempt to transfer their role onto someone else. Players want to avoid becoming the Slaphead as they will gradually lose points.

Requirements:

4 controllers and the willingness to slap your friends.
